name: Running Out of Space: Overwhelm
description:
Quick upload for epic megajam 2021 - very rushed project due to circumstances.

This is a representation of the difficulty I have dealing with day to day tasks due to my autism. I often feel like I am running out of space, and often get stuck unable to leave my room.

In this game, you must complete the task displayed on the to-do-list on the wall of your bedroom. The bedroom is a safe space, and will reduce stress while everywhere and everything else will cause you stress. Stress is represented by the visual effects that get applied to the screen. Once you reach 100% stressed, you lose.

Try your best to complete every task, but keep in mind that this game is meant to be difficult, as it represents what I, and many other people deal with on a day to day basis.
